title: Rangers card
data:
***Version [0.27](/0.27 "0.27")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                    |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The card depicts an arrow in a bull's-eye, which has been split by a second arrow. |

The Rangers card summons ranged weapon specialists to fight for the player.

There are four tiers of creatures:

| Tier 1                                                                                                                                                       | Tier 2                                                                                                                                             | Tier 3                                                                                                                                                         | Tier 4                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| c [![Centaur (monster).png](/images/8/87/Centaur_%28monster%29.png)](/File:Centaur_\(monster\).png) **[Centaurs](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)")** | c [![Centaur warrior.png](/images/7/7e/Centaur_warrior.png)](/File:Centaur_warrior.png) **[Centaur warriors](/Centaur_warrior "Centaur warrior")** | c [![Yaktaur captain.png](/images/3/35/Yaktaur_captain.png)](/File:Yaktaur_captain.png) **[Yaktaur captains](/Yaktaur_captain "Yaktaur captain")**             | c [![Satyr.png](/images/d/d8/Satyr.png)](/File:Satyr.png) **[Satyrs](/Satyr "Satyr")**                                                                                                       |
| c [![Yaktaur.png](/images/1/18/Yaktaur.png)](/File:Yaktaur.png) **[Yaktaurs](/Yaktaur "Yaktaur")**                                                           | c [![Faun.png](/images/3/3c/Faun.png)](/File:Faun.png) **[Fauns](/Faun "Faun")**                                                                   | N [![Naga sharpshooter.png](/images/0/0e/Naga_sharpshooter.png)](/File:Naga_sharpshooter.png) **[Naga sharpshooters](/Naga_sharpshooter "Naga sharpshooter")** | m [![Merfolk javelineer.png](/images/1/12/Merfolk_javelineer.png)](/File:Merfolk_javelineer.png) **[Merfolk javelineers](/Merfolk_javelineer "Merfolk javelineer")**                         |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                | e [![Deep elf master archer.png](/images/9/99/Deep_elf_master_archer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_master_archer.png) **[Deep elf master archers](/Deep_elf_master_archer "Deep elf master archer")** |

Card power determines what creatures are summoned:

- 0: Two or three of tier 1.
- 1: One of tier 1, and either one of tier 3 or another tier 1 and one of tier 2.
- 2: One of tier 2, and either one of tier 4 or another tier 2 and one of tier 3.

It can be found in the following [decks](/Decks "Decks"):

| [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                  | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                                                  | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                                                  | [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") and beyond                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") |

## History

- This card was one of 23 cards to be kept in the deck simplification of [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), but the deck of war was removed in this version.
- The Rangers card was added in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), replacing [the Bones](/Bones_card "Bones card") card.

## See also

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")
- [Decks](/Decks "Decks")

| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Deck of destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") | [Degeneration](/Degeneration_card "Degeneration card") • [The Orb](/Orb_card "Orb card") • [Pain](/Pain_card "Pain card") • [The Storm](/Storm_card "Storm card") • [Vitriol](/Vitriol_card "Vitriol card") • [Wild Magic](/Wild_Magic_card "Wild Magic card") |
| [Deck of escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape")                | [The Cloud](/Cloud_card "Cloud card") • [The Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") • [Exile](/Exile_card "Exile card") • [The Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") • [Velocity](/Velocity_card "Velocity card")                                                         |
| [Deck of summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning")       | [The Dance](/Dance_card "Dance card") • [The Elements](/Elements_card "Elements card") • [The Illusion](/Illusion_card "Illusion card") • [The Swarm](/Swarm_card "Swarm card") • [The Pentagram](/Pentagram_card "Pentagram card") • [The Rangers]()          |
| [Deck of punishment](/Deck_of_punishment "Deck of punishment")    | [Swine](/Swine_card "Swine card") • [Torment](/Torment_card "Torment card") • [Wraith](/Wraith_card "Wraith card") • [Wrath](/Wrath_card "Wrath card")                                                                                                         |
html:
Rangers card

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The card depicts an arrow in a bull's-eye, which has been split by a second arrow.

The Rangers card summons ranged weapon specialists to fight for the player.

There are four tiers of creatures:

Tier 1 Tier 2 Tier 3 Tier 4
c Centaurs c Centaur warriors c Yaktaur captains c Satyrs
c Yaktaurs c Fauns N Naga sharpshooters m Merfolk javelineers
e Deep elf master archers

Card power determines what creatures are summoned:

  • 0: Two or three of tier 1.
  • 1: One of tier 1, and either one of tier 3 or another tier 1 and one of tier 2.
  • 2: One of tier 2, and either one of tier 4 or another tier 2 and one of tier 3.

It can be found in the following decks:

0.16 0.17 0.18 0.19 and beyond

Summoning
War

Summoning
War

Summoning
War

Summoning

History

  • This card was one of 23 cards to be kept in the deck simplification of 0.19, but the deck of war was removed in this version.
  • The Rangers card was added in 0.16, replacing the Bones card.
